4.7.2 Link page

4.7.2.3 Version Information section of the Link page

The Project > Settings... dialog's Link page has a Version Information section that allows you to add major and minor version numbers to a DLL or EXE. The values in this section are recorded in the DLL or EXE that the project builds. Functional Developer uses them at compile time and run time to determine if compatible versions of Dylan libraries are in use. See "Versioning" on page 52 for details.

Getting Started with Functional Developer - 31 MAR 2000
